name: ARPK
description:
** Due to some personal/travel issues I wasn't able to work on the game properly these last few days so I'm sorry if it's a bit incomplete/unpolished. I'd like to add more levels in the future, but I also wanted to upload this version for the game jam. It's been fun! **

* Recommended resolution: 1024x768 / 640x360.

*Unity's pixel perfect camera likes to f*ck up wildly but feel free to try out other resolutions if those are a problem to you.

Solve puzzles and reach the exit by jumping between different dimensions of each level!

  • WASD/Arrow keys - Movement
  • Right click - Begin jump
  • Left click - Interact with adjacent objects/Confirm jump

Music by Phillip Gross [link]

(Everything else clumsily made by me)
